Package academy.mindswap.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
academy.mindswap.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
Server Class This class creates the blueprint for the Quizz_Bytes application.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the total amount of points being stolen from a random player.
